attributes.action: Change it so women can rape men by forcing penetrative.
attributes.additional_details: Change it so it is equal. Penetration is not rape. Non consensual sex is rape! The laws should be changed so men and women are charged the same rather then a woman getting a maximum penalty for sexual assault for the same crime.
attributes.background: Change the laws so any unwanted  sexual advance a woman makes on a man are charged the same. E.g. A woman having sex with an intoxicated man is rape. A woman forcing herself on top of a man is rape.  Forcing a man to penetrate you is rape.
